remarks: ` K ` is an integer.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem45.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem45.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem45.f $e |- F = ( x e. RR |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem45.a $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> ZZ ) $.
etransclem45.k $e |- K = ( sum_ k e. ( ( 0 ... M ) X. ( 0 ... R ) ) ( ( A ` ( 1st ` k ) ) x. ( ( ( RR Dn F ) ` ( 2nd ` k ) ) ` ( 1st ` k ) ) ) / ( ! ` ( P - 1 ) ) ) $.
etransclem45 $p |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
$d M j k x $.
$d M j x $.
$d P j k x $.
$d R j k x $.
$d j k ph x $.
